title: Seelbach Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Seelbach Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
bourbon
1/2
ounce
Cointreau
7
dashes
Angostura bitters
7
dashes
Peychaud’s bitters
5
ounces
chilled
dry Champagne
Directions
Pour everything except the Champagne into a Champagne flute and stir. Top with Champagne, give everything a light stir, and garnish with an orange twist.
